Package bto.Model

Class Project

  • java.lang.Object
    • bto.Model.Project
  • public class Project
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a housing project in the system. A project contains details such as flat types, application dates, and officer assignments.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Project.FlatTypeDetails
      Represents the details of a flat type in the project.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Constructor Detail

      • Project

        public Project​(java.lang.String projectName,
               java.lang.String neighborhood,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Project.FlatTypeDetails> flatTypes,
               java.time.LocalDate openingDate,
               java.time.LocalDate closingDate,
               java.lang.String manager,
               int officerSlots,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> assignedOfficers,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> requestedOfficers,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> rejectedOfficers,
               boolean isVisible)
        Constructs a Project with the specified details.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project.
        neighborhood - The neighborhood where the project is located.
        flatTypes - A map of flat types and their details.
        openingDate - The opening date for applications.
        closingDate - The closing date for applications.
        manager - The name of the manager responsible for the project.
        officerSlots - The number of officer slots available for the project.
        assignedOfficers - A list of officers assigned to the project.
        requestedOfficers - A list of officers who have requested to join the project.
        rejectedOfficers - A list of officers who have been rejected from the project.
        isVisible - Whether the project is visible to applicants.

    • Method Detail

      • isEligible

        public boolean isEligible​(Applicant applicant)
        Checks if an applicant is eligible to apply for the project.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant to check eligibility for.
        Returns:
        true if the applicant is eligible, false otherwise.

      • setOfficerSlots

        public void setOfficerSlots​(int slots)
        Sets the number of officer slots available for the project. The number of slots is capped at a maximum of 10.
        Parameters:
        slots - The number of officer slots to set.

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible​(boolean visible)
        Sets the visibility of the project.
        Parameters:
        visible - true to make the project visible, false otherwise.
